description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify sources for speciments for clinical testing. These concepts are used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBR segment prior to version 2.7, and was replaced by the concepts in code system 2.16.840.1.133883.18.311 specimenType and code system 2.16.840.1.133883.18.312 specimenCollectionMethod as of version 2.5 and thereafter.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0070 (Specimen Source Codes)

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: To be specified in another part of the message

definition.value: To be specified in another part of the message
